spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Bootcamp HIIT Row" emphasizes high intensity through short intervals and an advanced intensity level (3 out of 3), clearly aligning it with the "High-Energy & Intense" spirit. The HIIT format and use of high-energy music, such as Calvin Harris and Skrillex, further reinforce this classification. The score of 0.9 indicates a very strong match to this spirit.

The "Flow & Rhythm" spirit is less dominant but present. The workout includes music-driven pacing from dance and global hits, suggesting some elements of rhythmic flow, hence a moderate score of 0.5.

The "Sport & Agility" spirit is suggested by the athletic focus of rowing and the image of participants on a waterway, indicating performance-based elements. Including "navigate Indian Creek" suggests a sport-related aspect, earning a score of 0.6.

Other spirits like "Soothing & Restorative" and "Outdoor & Adventure" are less relevant due to the workout's intense and structured nature, despite being outdoors. "Structured & Disciplined" is also not highly relevant, as the workout seems more focused on intensity and less on precision or protocol.
